EmailTemplate.name: 201905_BK_Event_Oshkosh_mih.201905_BK_Event_Invite4_Oshkosh_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: Join Us in Oshkosh for EAA’s AirVenture Event | July 22 – July 28, 2019
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[http://www.bendixking.com/]]> 2019 ANNUAL CUSTOMER APPRECIATION EVENT YOU ARE INVITED! We’ll be celebrating our 60th Anniversary, alongside EAA’s 50th Anniversary for AirVenture event July 22 – July 28. From new products and services to complete integrated flight decks, we’ll have on display everything you’ll need to upgrade your experimental and certified aircraft. Make sure to visit us for demos on all our products, discuss innovative methods for financing your panel upgrades and find out our show specials and discounts with our partners.
Be sure to stop by our Partner Tent in our Pavilion to visit with our Repair Partners and find out how to save 10% on your next repair:
- Duncan Aviation - Mid-Continent Instruments & Avionics
This year, for your database purchase needs, we ask that you email DSA@honeywell.com or call 855-250-7027 (option 1). You can also visit our website at wingmanservices.bendixking.com <[[https://wingmanservices.bendixking.com/wingman/pages/wingmanLoginPage.jsp]]>. We will have a product support team onsite to answer questions on your legacy BendixKing equipment. If you have not done so yet, be sure to register for our Annual Customer Appreciation Event. This year’s event includes photo and autograph opportunities with Joe Coraggio and his Lancair Legacy with full BendixKing cockpit who will be competing in the Reno Air Races this September. Enjoy food and beverages with Joe, our team members and celebrate our 60th Anniversary.
REGISTER HERE FOR AN EVENT TICKET <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2019_BK_Oshkosh.html]]>
